paragraph: Radmila "Tina" Ivanović (Serbian Cyrillic: Радмила "Тина" Ивановић; born 28 September 1973) is a Serbian turbo-folk singer. Born in Kosovska Kamenica, at fourteen years of age she won Prvi glas pomoravlja singing festival in Batočina. Ivanović started her recording career in 1998, but gained popularity upon releasing her third album under Grand Production in 2004.
Tina appeared in the third series of reality show Farma in 2010, but eventually decided to voluntarily leave the competition.
